name: Intel_AIM_HTTP_API
API description: HTTP API For Accessing Anonymous Audience Data That Has Been Collected Through The IntelÂ® AIM Suite Viewer Analytics App

resources.displayName: Gets Impression/ Viewership Data For A Desired Date Range From The Intel AIM Suite Audience Counter

params.name: did | ac
params.displayName: The Device ID (did) Or Activation Code (ac)

params.name: start_year
params.displayName: Year For The Start Of The Date Range

params.name: start_month
params.displayName: Month For Start Of The Date Range

params.name: start_day
params.displayName: Day For Start Of The Date Range

params.name: end_year
params.displayName: Year For The End Of The Date Range

params.name: end_month
params.displayName: Month For The End Of The Date Range

params.name: end_day
params.displayName: Day For The End Of The Date Range

params.name: v
params.displayName: A Version Number (Must Be Set To 2)

params.name: show_fields
params.displayName: Whether To Include Field Names On The First Line. Set To 1 To Show Field Names Or 0 To Omit Field Names
